teamTasks.confirmEditTitle: Are you sure you want to edit this task?
teamTasks.confirmDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
teamTasks.confirmEditBlurb: Related item tasks will be modified as a consequence of applying this change, except for those that have already been answered or annotated
teamTasks.confirmDeleteBlurb: Related item tasks will be deleted as a consequence of applying this change, except for those that have already been answered or annotated
